classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

defaultValue.description: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.

disabled.description: If `true`, the rating will be disabled.

emptyIcon.description: The icon to display when empty.

emptyLabelText.description: The label read when the rating input is empty.

getLabelText.description:
Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current value of the rating.

For localization purposes, you can use the provided [translations](/guides/localization/).

tags.title: param
tags.description: The rating label's value to format.
tags.name: value

type.name: chained

name.description:
The name attribute of the radio `input` elements.
If `readOnly` is false, the prop is required,
this input name`should be unique within the parent form.

onChange.description: Callback fired when the value changes.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

onChangeActive.description: Callback function that is fired when the hover state changes.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

precision.description: The minimum increment value change allowed.

readOnly.description: Removes all hover effects and pointer events.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.sizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
descriptions.sizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `size="large"`.
descriptions.readOnly: Styles applied to the root element if `readOnly={true}`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.focusVisible: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if keyboard focused.
descriptions.pristine: Styles applied to the pristine label.
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the label elements.
descriptions.icon: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements.
descriptions.iconEmpty: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when empty.
descriptions.iconFilled: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when filled.
descriptions.iconHover: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when hover.
descriptions.iconFocus: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when focus.
descriptions.iconActive: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when active.
descriptions.decimal: Styles applied to the icon wrapping elements when decimals are necessary.
